data.name: Tom Clancy's The Division™ - Upper East Side Outfit Pack
data.detailed_description:
Ready to take back Manhattan's streets in style? Deck out your agent with four of the finest suits from the Upper East Side. This bundle includes:
- Upper East Side Black Suit
- Upper East Side Plaid Suit
- Upper East Side Striped Suit
- Upper East Side Tuxedo
data.about_the_game:
Ready to take back Manhattan's streets in style? Deck out your agent with four of the finest suits from the Upper East Side. This bundle includes:
- Upper East Side Black Suit
- Upper East Side Plaid Suit
- Upper East Side Striped Suit
- Upper East Side Tuxedo
data.short_description: Tom Clancy's  The Division™ - Upper East Side Outfit Pack
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Czech, Dutch, Hungarian, Japanese*, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil*, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Russian*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400 | AMD FX-6100, or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 560 with 2 GB VRAM (current equivalent NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760) | AMD Radeon HD 7770 with 2 GB VRAM, or better - See supported List*
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 | AMD FX-8350, or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 | AMD Radeon R9 290, or better - See supported List*
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
